test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
test:ci: npm run test:coverage && npm run quality:gate
quality:gate: npm run quality:gate:backend && npm run quality:gate:frontend
quality:gate:backend: cd backend && npm test -- --coverage --passWithNoTests && npx istanbul check-coverage --statements 70 --branches 70 --functions 70 --lines 70
quality:gate:frontend: cd frontend && npm run test:coverage && npx istanbul check-coverage --statements 70 --branches 70 --functions 70 --lines 70
